scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs 'KONKON Beats' on a festive stage, followed by a short MC segment.
A transition scene with visual effects as the stage clears for the next performer.
Sakura Miko takes the stage, greets the audience, and performs 'Otome no Susume!'.

subtitles.original: はい 嫌なことがあった日でも
subtitles.english: Yes, even on days when bad things happen,

subtitles.original: 笑えちゃう僕らがいいね
subtitles.english: it's great that we can still laugh.

subtitles.original: そうだ君がフレンドなら無敵じゃない？ってことよ
subtitles.english: That's right, if you're my friend, aren't we invincible?

subtitles.original: 今でも本気にしてる
subtitles.english: I still believe that in earnest.

subtitles.original: 生まれも育ちも 話す言葉も
subtitles.english: Our birthplace, our upbringing, the words we speak,

subtitles.original: 趣味も歩幅も ひとつの愛し方も
subtitles.english: our hobbies, our pace, and the way we love,

subtitles.original: いつだって僕らはちょっとズレている
subtitles.english: we're always slightly different from each other.

subtitles.original: それを大事にしてよ
subtitles.english: Please cherish that.

subtitles.original: Are you ready? コンコンコン
subtitles.english: Are you ready? Kon kon kon!

subtitles.original: イエス こんなキツネに化かされて
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm a fox who's bewitched you!

subtitles.original: Love Love Love 心をあげて
subtitles.english: Love Love Love, give me your heart!

subtitles.original: Yeah Yeah Everything's gonna be alright
subtitles.english: Yeah Yeah Everything's gonna be alright!

subtitles.original: 感情今 うわさの Feel with you
subtitles.english: Emotions now, that rumored 'Feel with you'.

subtitles.original: もう一回 コンコンコン
subtitles.english: One more time! Kon kon kon!

subtitles.original: イエス こんなキツネに化かされて
subtitles.english: Yes! I'm a fox who's bewitched you!

subtitles.original: Love Love Love 心をあげて
subtitles.english: Love Love Love, give me your heart!

subtitles.original: Yeah Yeah Top music
subtitles.english: Yeah Yeah Top music!

subtitles.original: ほら後まで行くよ
subtitles.english: Look, it'll reach even the back!

subtitles.original: 今 空の波にチューニング
subtitles.english: Now, tuning into the waves of the sky...

subtitles.original: Wow Wow コンコンコン 魔法をかけて
subtitles.english: Wow Wow Kon kon kon! Cast a spell!

subtitles.original: 上を向けるまで Feel with you
subtitles.english: Until you can look up, Feel with you!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: Awesome!

subtitles.original: ハイ！ ハイ！
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: 皆さんありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much, everyone!

subtitles.original: まだまだ最後まで楽しんでいってくださいね！
subtitles.english: Please continue to enjoy yourselves until the very end!

subtitles.original: 愛してるぜー！
subtitles.english: I love you all!

subtitles.original: 放て この思いを 鮮やかに
subtitles.english: Release these feelings vividly,

subtitles.original: 響け 乙女の歌
subtitles.english: echo forth, the maiden's song!

subtitles.original: 乙女のすすめ！
subtitles.english: Otome no Susume!

subtitles.original: にゃっはろー！
subtitles.english: Nyaho-hello!

subtitles.original: エリート巫女の、さくらみこだにぇー！
subtitles.english: It's the elite miko, Sakura Miko!

subtitles.original: みんな、盛り上がっていくぞー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, let's get hyped up!

subtitles.original: 前向いてぐんぐん出発進行
subtitles.english: Looking forward, moving right along, full speed ahead!

subtitles.original: 立ち止まる予定あるわけない
subtitles.english: I have no intention of stopping!

subtitles.original: 笑顔にさせちゃう神様進行
subtitles.english: A divine advance that'll make everyone smile!

subtitles.original: それつまりどこのどなた様？
subtitles.english: And just who exactly might that be?

subtitles.original: じゃあ始めようか 空を染め上げて
subtitles.english: Well then, shall we begin? Dyeing the sky with color...

subtitles.original: ほらあっちもこっちもそっちもどっちも
subtitles.english: Look, over here, over there, everywhere you look!

subtitles.original: 日進月歩 華やかに
subtitles.english: Steady progress, made in spectacular fashion!

subtitles.original: 変えていこうよ
subtitles.english: Let's keep on changing!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 咲き誇り
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, in full bloom,

subtitles.original: 甘酸っぱくなれるように
subtitles.english: so that they can become bittersweet.

subtitles.original: 一歩 右に左 輝く姿
subtitles.english: Moving left and right, a sparkling figure,

subtitles.original: 信じてついてきてね
subtitles.english: believe in me and follow along!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 夢を見たり
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, dreaming dreams,

subtitles.original: どんな困難だって
subtitles.english: no matter what difficulties arise,

subtitles.original: きっと 君と二人乗り越えるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure the two of us can overcome them together.

subtitles.original: 上手歌うよ さあすすめ
subtitles.english: I'll sing my heart out, now let's go!

subtitles.original: ピアッサンサン 登る太陽
subtitles.english: Piyassan-san, the rising sun!

subtitles.original: 春の光 すすはれの空
subtitles.english: Spring light, in a clear and bright sky!

subtitles.original: 上手のフリして ここにいたいな
subtitles.english: I want to stay right here, pretending to be skillful!

subtitles.original: 君に届けたいこの思い
subtitles.english: These feelings I want to convey to you...

subtitles.original: さあ悩み隠る 人は聞きなさい
subtitles.english: Now, for those hiding their worries, listen closely!

subtitles.original: そういっぱいいっぱいあるのより
subtitles.english: Instead of having many, many things,

subtitles.original: いっぱい絶対幸せを
subtitles.english: let's find absolute happiness,

subtitles.original: 知れば大吉
subtitles.english: and if you know it, you'll have great luck!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 咲き誇り
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, in full bloom,

subtitles.original: 甘酸っぱい気持ち
subtitles.english: a bittersweet feeling...

subtitles.original: ずっと胸に胸に持ち続けて
subtitles.english: I'll keep it in my heart forever and ever,

subtitles.original: 願いを叶えていくよ
subtitles.english: and make my wishes come true!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 夢を見たり
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, dreaming dreams,

subtitles.original: 憧れた景色がある
subtitles.english: there's a scenery I've longed for.

subtitles.original: ずっと 君の隣 掴めるから
subtitles.english: By your side, I can reach out and grab it,

subtitles.original: 光を添えて いざすすめ
subtitles.english: adding light to the path, now let's go!

subtitles.original: 上手歌うよ さあすすめ
subtitles.english: I'll sing my heart out, now let's go!

subtitles.original: かじかむ冬に勝った人に
subtitles.english: To those who've overcome the freezing winter,

subtitles.original: 枝の先 膨らんでいる蕾
subtitles.english: the buds at the ends of the branches are swelling.

subtitles.original: 春の風を待ってたんだよ
subtitles.english: They've been waiting for the spring breeze...

subtitles.original: それは君という風
subtitles.english: and that breeze is you!

subtitles.original: 背中を押す 進行は
subtitles.english: An advance that pushes us forward!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 咲き誇り
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, in full bloom,

subtitles.original: 甘酸っぱくなれるように
subtitles.english: so that they can become bittersweet.

subtitles.original: 一歩 右に左 輝く姿
subtitles.english: Moving left and right, a sparkling figure,

subtitles.original: 信じてついてきてね
subtitles.english: believe in me and follow along!

subtitles.original: 桜ひらり 夢を見たり
subtitles.english: Cherry blossoms fluttering, dreaming dreams,

subtitles.original: どんな困難だって
subtitles.english: no matter what difficulties arise,

subtitles.original: きっと 君と二人乗り越えるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure the two of us can overcome them together.

subtitles.original: 上手歌うよ さあすすめ
subtitles.english: I'll sing my heart out, now let's go!

subtitles.original: 上手歌うよ さあすすめ
subtitles.english: I'll sing my heart out, now let's go!
